hero.title: Makomar ilmin Musulunci, ƙarƙashin taimakon AI
hero.subtitle: Taimaka mana gina mafi girman ɗakin karatu, tabbatar da mafi yawan damar shiga, da kuma sauƙaƙa bincike mai ƙarfi a ilimin Musulunci na ƙarni na 21.
hero.description: Tare da goyon bayanka, Usul ta sanya daruruwan littattafan tarihi su zama masu sauƙin samu, suna kaiwa dubunnan masu amfani a duniya baki ɗaya.

donate-widget.active-monthly-donors: {donors, number} masu bayar da gudummawa na kowane wata

one.title: Faɗaɗa Damar Shiga Zuwa Rubuce-Rubucen Musulunci

features.0: Tarakta da samar da sauƙin shiga sama da 15,000 majiyoyin ilimin Musulunci da aka loda su cikin tsarin PDF da eBook, tare da tsari mai tsabta da sauƙin karantawa.
features.1: Mayar da PDFs da ba su motsi zuwa tsarin da aka tsara kuma injin na’ura zai iya karantawa, domin sauƙaƙa bincike da nazari.

two.title: Inganta Bincike da Kayan aikin Hankali Masu Amfani da AI

features.0: Fasahar bincike mai zurfi wadda ke ba masu amfani damar gano bayanai a sauƙaƙe.
features.1: Kayan taimako na AI da ke ba masu bincike damar bin manyan tarin rubuce-rubucen Musulunci cikin sauki.

three.title: Bada Damar Nazari Mai Fadi
three.description: Taimakawa nazari mai faɗi, daidai a fadin rubuce-rubucen Musulunci daban-daban wanda ke bude sabbin damammaki ga binciken Musulunci. Samar da damar lilo cikin manyan tarin ayyuka na ilimin Musulunci da sauri don a iya magance al'amura da kuma gano abin da ke ciki cikin hanzari da daidaito, masu bincike za su iya amfani da Usul don bin maudu'ai da tsari cikin sauri da daidaito.

roadmap.title: Shirin Usul: Mafarkinmu na Gaba
roadmap.description: Gudummuwarka za ta taimaka mana cimma wadannan buruka:

0.title: Bincike Mai Amfani da AI don Majiyoyin Musulunci

features.0: Saka kayan bincike na zamani da sabbin fasahar AI don masu bincike su gano bayanai daidai cikin gaggawa.
features.1: Samar da damar lilo cikin manyan majiyoyin rubuce-rubucen Musulunci cikin sauki.

1.title: Tarin Daban-daban na Musulunci da Aka Tantance

features.0: Aiki tare da manyan masana don tsara "ma'ajiyar yabo" ta kowanne ɓangaren ilimin Musulunci.
features.1: Kirkira da tarin majiyoyi na musamman don kowane irin rubutu.

features.0: Gina tsari da haɗin gwiwa da dakunan karatu da sauran majiyoyin yanar gizo don adana babban damin rubutattun bayanai cikin tsarin dijital na zamani.
features.1: Tabbatar da cewa yayin da duniyar ilimi ta yanar gizo ke habbaka, dukkan ayyukan suna kasancewa masu sauƙin samu, bincika, da nazari.

be-part.title: Tallafa wa Manufar Usul
be-part.description: Gudummawarka tana ƙarfafa ci gaban binciken lokaci-ƙan-ƙani kuma tana dorewar ci gaban kayan aikin bincike na zamani don ilimin Musulunci.

why-support.title: Me ya sa za a tallafi Usul?

features.0: Hanzarta binciken ilimin Musulunci a kan matsalolin zamani da ke bukatar zurfin nazari a tsakanin tarin bayanai masu yawa – tun daga AI mai kima da shugabanci na Musulunci zuwa yadda za a yi ko a bar amfani da AI don fitar da fatawoyi, tantance lafiyar likita, da harkokin kuɗi.
features.1: Hanzarta ilimi da ilimin Musulunci gaba ɗaya ta hanyar gina tsari don amfani a makarantun duniya, jami’o’i, da kotuna da ke bukatar ingantattun kayan bincike na cikin gida ko na kwatanta ilimin Musulunci.
features.2: Zama wani muhimmin ɓangare a tsara yadda za a adana da kuma nazarin addinin Musulunci a nan gaba

choose-amount.title: Zaɓi adadin gudummawar ku:
choose-amount.note: Seemore Foundation, ƙungiya mai zaman kanta ta faɗaɗa (501(c)(3)), ce ke tattara gudummawa (ana jiran amincewa). Dukkan gudummawa za su sami ragin haraji a Amurka. Idan akwai tambaya, tuntube mu a donors@usul.ai.

success.title: Na gode da gudummawarku!
success.description: Gatan ku yana kawo bambanci na hakika. Muna yaba tallafinku a aikin mu.

verification.title: Menene imel ɗinka?
verification.description: Ana buƙatar imel don aika maka da takaddun shaidar ku da sabunta gudummawa.
verification.sent-code: Mun aika da lambar zuwa imel ɗinka. Da fatan za a shigar da shi a ƙasa don kammala gudummawa.
